title: Table 34 - Row 4
clause_text: Proposed Land-use Zone: Eco-Sensitive Area | Permissible Users: Users permissible shall be as per MOEF Notification dt.27/02/2017. | Permissible FSI: a) Maximum permissible FSI shall be 0.75 for the lands falling within permissible peripheral distance from the gaothan. b) Maximum permissible FSI shall be as per Regulation No.4.11 from the lands falling beyond such permissible distance.

values: Users permissible shall be as per MOEF Notification dt.27/02/2017.

a) Maximum permissible FSI shall be 0.75 for the lands falling within permissible peripheral distance from the gaothan. b) Maximum permissible FSI shall be as per Regulation No.4.11 from the lands falling beyond such permissible distance.
